title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Five years ago, Trump came down escalator, Rush told you to take him seriously. Fake sites selling Rush Space Force t-shirts, only official Rush gear is in Rush Limbaugh Show Store. Beverly Beatty lectures white liberals in Seattle, schools them on Biden and Democrats. 1993: Biden says "fine people" fly the confederate flag. Victor Davis Hanson on #MeToo and Black Lives Matter. Puzzling SCOTUS rulings. Were Kavanaugh attacks designed to scare conservative justices? 1992: Biden brags that his crime bill will do everything but hang people for jaywalking.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

May retail sales surge 17%. Trump economy can't be killed. Conventional wisdom on Trump is wrong, reelection likely. Biden can't beat Trump. Only Trump can beat Trump, separate him from his voters. David Horowitz's new book "Blitz" predicts Trump landslide. Daniel Horowitz on SCOTUS rulings. Theory on Gorsuch ruling on transgender discrimination. Seattle CHOP is microcosm of liberalism. Emotion, reason and the George Floyd tape. LGBTQ caller on SCOTUS ruling, emotion vs. the law. The war on hydroxychloroquine.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

It's news that the president is against defunding the police? It's insane! The news should be anyone who's for it. Amazon supports Black Lives Matter, sells Blue Lives Murder T-shirts. Cops quitting all across the country. Oklahoma State RB threatens to quit because coach wore an OAN T-shirt, coach apologizes. Military leadership structure in the police. Buck Sexton rant on conservative media giving up.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
